title: Swain heal is BS in ARAM
body: Nope {{item:3165}} didn't help at all because his fcking health bar just won't drop below 40% and he heals for 78 health per tick its fcking ridiculous. And if no one has ignite its fcking GG. Fck this champion.

replies.body: just lock in ignite when you see swain pop up on the enemy team = profit? :^)

> [{quoted}](name=FioraTheExplorer,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Pje35tyW,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-10-07T22:02:42.078+0000)
>
> just lock in ignite when you see swain pop up on the enemy team = profit? :^)

Its fcking Aram u don't see the enemy champions.
You do in the last second.
neither of you 2 have obviously played aram anytime soon.....(and fiora)

I played aram this morning and about 3 yesterday
and what do you mean "you 2" there are 3 of us and Fiora isn't a problem in aram your main problem is Garen(cause +300 hp per sec) and Cho'Gath(The terror of the Void and the Abyss)

> [{quoted}](name=mutley,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Pje35tyW,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-08T14:15:21.605+0000)
>
> I played aram this morning and about 3 yesterday
> and what do you mean "you 2" there are 3 of us and Fiora isn't a problem in aram your main problem is Garen(cause +300 hp per sec) and Cho'Gath(The terror of the Void and the Abyss)

Well Garen is fine because at least he is not healing when he is in a teamfight where he is taking dmg
Yeah but Garen isn't healing in a team fight, because after that last team fight Garen went chicken stayed behind tower for 20 seconds and fully healed up 3.5K damage.

lol no i meant you and fioratheexplorer, its impossible to change summoners when the other teams comp has been revealed. yeah garen and darius are the most lethal in aram currently, and then most champs with warmogs
of all the things to complain about on aram, you pick swain and it ISNT his W? wow....as if soraka warmogs isnt op enough....

> [{quoted}](name=GigaPube,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Pje35tyW,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-10-08T13:59:23.850+0000)
>
> of all the things to complain about on aram, you pick swain and it ISNT his W? wow....as if soraka warmogs isnt op enough....

Soraka with warmogs only make her lose more health when you heal your teammates.

> [{quoted}](name=GigaPube,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Pje35tyW,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-10-08T16:28:45.432+0000)
>
> the regen is still op

he only gets that op regen at lvl 16 and when he is out of combat. I admit that healing is op but {{item:3165}} can still affect garen because garen's health bar actually drops to 40% but swain just keep healing and doesn't drop at all.

Your name has soraka heal in it and you're complaining about swains heal.. Lol
Anywayyy.. Most champs are strong in aram.. Any aoe/spam champ is a beast. My favourites are: brand, velkoz, ziggs, kogmaw, karma

only ziggs is op from that lot. brand has a lot of potential but, as always, nobody likes to peel, and anyone with no escapes is gonna get rekt. at least ziggs has great zoning and disengage, and poke aswell of course. anyone with a shorter range of poke than a ziggs Q isnt gonna do too well either, thats why the most op champs are like varus xerath and jayce, for poking. kogmaw....you buy a tear just so you can ult a few more times and then you're out of mana and probably dont have enough regen. its not worth it

> [{quoted}](name=VENI VIDI VICI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Pje35tyW,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-07T21:16:33.006+0000)
>
> Your name has soraka heal in it and you're complaining about swains heal.. Lol
> Anywayyy.. Most champs are strong in aram.. Any aoe/spam champ is a beast. My favourites are: brand, velkoz, ziggs, kogmaw, karma

The thing is 5 man focus the swain and his health bar won't even drop when he have his ult on

Cho'Gath is op if he can stack his ult 6 times (which is possible in like 3 minutes)

I know this because I had to verse this line up: Cho'Gath Yasuo Nidalee Ashe and Twitch.
Cho'Gath knocks up 3+ Yasuo ults in if Cho'Gath does a 3+ man knock up then Ashe lands magic ult on me 24/7 then twitch uses ult and the AoE damage/slow so even if we do survive we continue taking 25 true damage/sec for like the next 5/6 seconds. then while were low/dead and even b4 the actual fight Nidalee had the 24/7 long range poke.
